comment: Considering Dr. Golden is teaching future teachers, he is probably one of the worst examples of a teacher out there. HE DOES NOT TEACH. You teach yourself along with your group every week by doing worksheets together. He just sits there. This is a useless, redundant class, and it's so difficult to actually take it seriously.

This 'teacher' is not a teacher. He never teaches!  I did not learn anything in his class.  You will always get an A but his worksheets are hard work.  All you do is worksheets, in class and in lab.  I dreaded coming to this class.  I would NOT recommend this professor.

Dr. Golden is a sweet old man who is flexible and can be helpful. All the work is in groups so if you miss a class, you will probably get a bad group grade. If you miss a lab class, he will let you make it up on your own but it is SO much easier to do in class because sometimes the labs aren't clear. It's an easy class if you go every time!
He is a sweet old guy. His grading is very easy. Like the others said, it's all group work.
All small-group work. Two take-home tests and in-class final. Grades generously and is happy to talk about the material but he talks in circles. He's nice but the course material is frustrating.

Dr. Golden is one of the sweetest and most knowledgable guys around.  He has been around forever, and knows what he wants.  He helps you find the answer you need, and allowed every-single-assignment and test to be done with group members.  Super easy A, although the late night labs were kind of boring!

Almost ALL group work. Don't buy the book b/c you won't need it. Rely on the internet to do all work and tests. He is not clear or changes his mind on what he's looking for ref. answers. Grades fair. If you are good at "fluffing" your way through a class instead of actually wanting to learn it, then this class is for you. Tests are mostly essay.

Lots of group work...very easy.  Definitely do NOT buy the book, its not needed at all.  Labs were easy and were all group work as well.  Two exams which were take home.  Very nice guy and a good teacher.  Highly recommended.
Alot of group work invovled but a very helpful teacher. I would recomend him as a teacher.
